comments:
I20050323-0842, Linux 2.6.10, GTK+ 2.6.2, KDE 3.3.2, X.org 6.8.2

Switch editors rapidly (Ctrl+PageUp / Ctrl+PageDown) with the CVS resource
history view visible and linked to the editor.  After a while, a dialog appears
saying multiple errors occurred.  The following is in the log.


!ENTRY org.eclipse.team.cvs.core 4 0 2005-03-23 10:08:27.362
!MESSAGE I/O exception occurred: Read end dead
!STACK 0
java.io.IOException: Read end dead
	at java.io.PipedInputStream.checkStateForReceive(PipedInputStream.java:192)
	at java.io.PipedInputStream.receive(PipedInputStream.java:133)
	at java.io.PipedOutputStream.write(PipedOutputStream.java:103)
	at java.io.FilterOutputStream.write(FilterOutputStream.java:60)
	at java.io.FilterOutputStream.write(FilterOutputStream.java:108)
	at java.io.BufferedOutputStream.flushBuffer(BufferedOutputStream.java:65)
	at java.io.BufferedOutputStream.flush(BufferedOutputStream.java:123)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.core.streams.TimeoutOutputStream.writeUntilDone(TimeoutOutputStream.java:272)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.core.streams.TimeoutOutputStream.runThread(TimeoutOutputStream.java:195)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.core.streams.TimeoutOutputStream.access$0(TimeoutOutputStream.java:193)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.core.streams.TimeoutOutputStream$1.run(TimeoutOutputStream.java:66)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:595)

!ENTRY org.eclipse.team.cvs.core 4 0 2005-03-23 10:08:27.582
!MESSAGE I/O exception occurred: Read end dead
!STACK 0
java.io.IOException: Read end dead
	at java.io.PipedInputStream.checkStateForReceive(PipedInputStream.java:192)
	at java.io.PipedInputStream.receive(PipedInputStream.java:133)
	at java.io.PipedOutputStream.write(PipedOutputStream.java:103)
	at java.io.FilterOutputStream.write(FilterOutputStream.java:60)
	at java.io.FilterOutputStream.write(FilterOutputStream.java:108)
	at java.io.BufferedOutputStream.flushBuffer(BufferedOutputStream.java:65)
	at java.io.BufferedOutputStream.flush(BufferedOutputStream.java:123)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.core.streams.TimeoutOutputStream.writeUntilDone(TimeoutOutputStream.java:272)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.core.streams.TimeoutOutputStream.runThread(TimeoutOutputStream.java:195)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.core.streams.TimeoutOutputStream.access$0(TimeoutOutputStream.java:193)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.core.streams.TimeoutOutputStream$1.run(TimeoutOutputStream.java:66)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:595)

!ENTRY org.eclipse.team.cvs.core 4 0 2005-03-23 10:08:27.698
!MESSAGE I/O exception occurred: Read end dead
!STACK 0
java.io.IOException: Read end dead
	at java.io.PipedInputStream.checkStateForReceive(PipedInputStream.java:192)
	at java.io.PipedInputStream.receive(PipedInputStream.java:133)
	at java.io.PipedOutputStream.write(PipedOutputStream.java:103)
	at java.io.FilterOutputStream.write(FilterOutputStream.java:60)
	at java.io.FilterOutputStream.write(FilterOutputStream.java:108)
	at java.io.BufferedOutputStream.flushBuffer(BufferedOutputStream.java:65)
	at java.io.BufferedOutputStream.flush(BufferedOutputStream.java:123)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.core.streams.TimeoutOutputStream.writeUntilDone(TimeoutOutputStream.java:272)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.core.streams.TimeoutOutputStream.runThread(TimeoutOutputStream.java:195)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.core.streams.TimeoutOutputStream.access$0(TimeoutOutputStream.java:193)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.core.streams.TimeoutOutputStream$1.run(TimeoutOutputStream.java:66)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:595)

I believe this is a threading issue in the SSH2 client that we are using 
(actually in piped streams). The problem is that we need to work around an 
issue in the client involving stream sharing and blocked I/O. We had to do so 
using concurrency and this seems to occasionaly cause a problem in piped 
streams.
*** Bug 83306 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
I haven;t seen this lately so perhaps the later versions of JSch or the JDK have fixed it.
